titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of October 2025 as "Substance Use & Misuse Prevention Month" to raise awareness of substance use and misuse in the United States.
A resolution supporting the designation of October 2025 as "Substance Use & Misuse Prevention Month" to raise awareness of substance use and misuse in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
